column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''47''' is the forty-seventh issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Eldarin Hands, Fingers & Numerals and Related Writings" — Part One — [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]; edited by [[Patrick H. Wynne]]
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
